Row.Text: Under my hand, wherever there is conflict and chaos I strike it down. I will have peace, even amidst ashes.
There is one head alone that sits at the center of the world, and it is mine.

I was an emperor; now just a pawn in someone else's game.
Indeed. Now, if you will excuse me
